922280.name: Fantasy Grounds - Quests of Doom 4: Between a Rock and a Charred Place (5E)
922280.description:
Quests of Doom 4: Between a Rock and a Charred Place

By
Tom Knauss
Between a Rock and a Charred Placeis a 7th-level adventure that thrusts the PCs into the middle of an epic confrontation between the dwarves of the Stoneheart Mountains and the hobgoblins just beyond their borders. Under their new leadership, the hobgoblin warmongers deploy an innovative grand strategy: to forge an alliance with one of the dwarves' old enemies and a traitor in their foes' midst. The dwarves' dominance over the region and very survival hangs in the balance if the PCs cannot thwart the monsters' ambitious plans.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Charles Surette
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
